ontocomAgent.ontology
Class OntologyOnline

java.lang.Object
  ontocomAgent.ontology.MethodsSPARQL
      ontocomAgent.ontology.OntologyOnline

public class OntologyOnline
extends MethodsSPARQL

This class is responsible for providing a means to access ontologies directly to the web. This class inherits the features of the class MethodsSPARQL Nonfunctional if the application is running behind a proxy. It is always recommended to download the ontology, using it in a saved file for use only with the class MethodsSPARQL (Suggests ontology versioning and not its direct use from web).



Author:
Fabio Aiub Sperotto
email
